headline: Deep Thoughts: Lee Westwood on Tonsillitis and Idolizing Greg Norman

body: Lee Westwood talks about the worst pain he's ever experienced, his greatest accomplishment, the sports figures he worshipped when he was young, and what he'd choose for his last meal on earth.
